SEARCH:
Package com.example.labyrinthapp

Klasse SQLiteHandler

java.lang.Object
android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
com.example.labyrinthapp.SQLiteHandler
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
AutoCloseable
public class SQLiteHandler extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
The SQLiteHandler class is responsible for handling database operations for the leaderboard.

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer(String name, int level, int time)
      Adds a player to the leaderboard table.
      Parameter:
      name - The name of the player.
      level - The level reached by the player.
      time - The completion time of the player.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the player was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • getTop10Players

      public List<Player> getTop10Players()
      Retrieves the top 10 players from the leaderboard table.
      Gibt zurück:
      A list of Player objects representing the top 10 players in order.

    • getPlayerPosition

      public int getPlayerPosition(Player player)
      Gets the position of a given player in the leaderboard.
      Parameter:
      player - The player object.
      Gibt zurück:
      The position of the player in the leaderboard.
